availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John R. Barbee (Taylor County, Kentucky, minister and farmer)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, minister and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Barbee. Father of Mary R. Barbee, Helena Barbee, Joseph E. Barbee, and John W. Barbee. Minister in Taylor County in 1860. Farmer in Taylor County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 2, p. 3.
Find A Grave, "Rev John R Barbee (December 26, 1828-March 21, 1902)," Memorial #69124649, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/69124649 (accessed April 23, 2018).
